attributes.additional_details: I think that people from other counties should pay for health care for the first 5 yrs they are in this country drs and  especially nurses should be paid a decent wage when we go on holiday we have to take out holiday insurance so if we are ill we can get mediocre treatment but people from other countries come here and get it free are old ware hero,s are being neglected  they are the men and women who made this country great please help us keep it this way
